heMpegCommonMIB.name: heMpegCommonMIB

revisions.description: Resolved compile errors: 1. LAST-UPDATED date matches last REVISION date. 2. Removed illegal characters such as line feed (ascii 0xa0). 3. Added mpegInputTSActiveConnection to at least one conformance group. 4. Removed extra mpegSessionsGroup in compliance statement.
1. Added mpegInputTSActiveConnection entry. 2. Added mpegInputTSOutputSessionCreateTime. 3. Added mpegInputUdpOriginationInputTSIndex. 4. Added mpegOutputUdpDestinationOutputTSIndex.

Changes included in the SCTE F2F meetings July 9-10 and Sept 24-25 1. mpegInputTSEntry, mpegOutputTSEntry, mpegProgESEntry are no longer indexed by ifIndex. 2. mpegInputTSTransportType and mpegInputTSPacketsDetected removed from mpegInputTSEntry to accomodate the Input extensibility such as udpOrigination. 3. Added to mpegInputTSEntry mpegInputTSConnectionType and mpegInputTSConnection. 4. mpegInputTSPatVersion and mpegInputTSCatVersion value -1 added to indicate unknown or not supported. 5. MpegProgESEntry sequence elements names updates to align with mpegProgES* prefix. 6. mpegStatsStreamTable renamed to mpegInputStatsTable. 7. mpegInputStatsPcrJitter and mpegInputStatsMaxPacketJitter support value -1 to indicate not supported measurement. 8. Added mpegInputUdpOriginationTable and mpegOutputUdpOriginationTable to generalize the input/output TS construct. 9. Updated parent OID of mpegInsertPacketTable to reflect the output nature of the construct. 10. Renamed mpegInsertPacketDeviceIndex as mpegInsertPacketDeviceIfIndex. 11. mpegOutputStatsTotalPackets set to 64 bits counter. 12.mpegOutputStatsChannelUtilization units set to 1 tenth of percent. 13. Added to mpegOutputTSEntry mpegOutputTSConnectionType and mpegOutputTSConnection. 14. mpegOutputProgNo changed ACCESS to read-only. 15. mpegOutputProgESPid renamed to mpegOutputProgElemStatsPid to preserve the construct prefix MpegOutputProgElemStats*. 16. Added mpegOutputUdpDestinationTable. 17. Deleted mpegProgramMappingDeviceChannelId and mpegProgramMappingInputIfIndex from MpegProgramMappingEntry. 18. MpegVideoSessionEntry Added: mpegVideoSessionPIDRemap, mpegVideoSessionMode, mpegVideoSessionEncryptionType, mpegVideoSessionEncryptionInfo, mpegVideoSessionBitRate, mpegVideoSessionSelectedInput. 19. MpegVideoSessionEntry Deleted: mpegVideoSessionUdpPort, mpegVideoSessionDestAddrType, mpegVideoSessionDestAddr, mpegVideoSessionSrcAddrType, mpegVideoSessionSrcAddr. 20. Added mpegVideoSessionPtrTable. 21. Updated mpegInputProgESGroup and mpegOutputProgElemStatsGroup description. 22. Updated OBJECT-GROUP mpegInputGroup, mpegInputProgESGroup, mpegOutputGroup, mpegMappingsGroup, mpegSessionsGroup. 23. Added mpegInputStatsPcrIntervalExceeds to the MPEG input statistics. 24. Added the table mpegInputUdpOriginationSessionTable.

Changes due to voting comments 1. Changed description of mpegInputTSPsiDetected. 2. Changed mpegInputTSRate, mpegInputTXMaxRate, mpegInsertPacketIndex, and mpegInsertPacketListId be Unsigned32 instead of Integer32. 3. Unit clause added to mpegOutputStatsAvailableBandwidth specifying bps. 4. Modified all references to QAM and used the word Device instead. 5. mpegOutputTSPmtInsertRate description changed, mpegOutputTSPmtInsertRate value changed to tables/ms. 6. mpegProgramMappingInputProgIndex in description changed rfDeviceInputProgIndex to mpegInputProgIndex. 7. mpegProgramMappingInputTSIndex in description changed rfDeviceInputTSIndex to mpgetInputTSIndex.
Changes due to voting comments 1. Removed TEXTUAL-CONVENTION import 2. Reworded the last sentence of the Module definition. 3. Reordered MIB tree to fit under the heDigital branch.
Added SCTE-HMS-HEADENDIDENT-TC name for HePidValue, remove name from this file. Created TC ProgDataType so it can be used everywhere. Removed 0 from enumerated types just for convention.

heMpegCommonMIB.description: This MIB module is for representing MPEG equipment present in the headend and is supported by a SNMP agent. It defines both the MPEG input and output MIB objects for managing MPEG input and output transport streams, programs and elementary streams. It provides both input and output related statistics, as well as program mapping and video session information. All the tables, except mpegProgramMappingTable and mpegVideoSessionTable, capture and store the information related to active transport streams only. Optional MIB objects will have default values defined in this MIB file.

mpegMIBObjects.name: mpegMIBObjects
mpegMIBObjects.description: This branch specifies the MPEG Common MIB objects that can be common to any device using MPEG.

mpegDigitalInputs.name: mpegDigitalInputs
mpegDigitalInputs.description: This branch specifies the attributes of the incoming streams to the MPEG device.

mpegOutputs.name: mpegOutputs
mpegOutputs.description: This branch specifies the attributes of the output streams of the MPEG device.

mpegMIBConformance.name: mpegMIBConformance
mpegMIBConformance.description: This branch describes the different MPEG MIB object groups and the different levels of compliance.

mpegMIBCompliances.name: mpegMIBCompliances
mpegMIBCompliances.description: The different levels of compliance to the MPEG MIB.

mpegLossOfSignalTimeout.name: mpegLossOfSignalTimeout
mpegLossOfSignalTimeout.description: This object specifies the loss of signal timeout on any incoming stream.

mpegInputTSTable.name: mpegInputTSTable
mpegInputTSTable.description: This table specifies the attributes of video sessions or SPTSs.

mpegInputTSEntry.name: mpegInputTSEntry
mpegInputTSEntry.description: Each entry specifies the attributes of a transport stream (SPTS/MPTS).

mpegInputTSIndex.name: mpegInputTSIndex
mpegInputTSIndex.description: The unique identifier of the Input TS.

mpegInputTSType.name: mpegInputTSType
mpegInputTSType.description: The type of stream, e.g., SPTS or MPTS.

mpegInputTSConnectionType.name: mpegInputTSConnectionType
mpegInputTSConnectionType.description: The type of input flow of the stream. The value 'udp' indicates either unicast or multicast udp origination flows.

mpegInputTSConnection.name: mpegInputTSConnection
mpegInputTSConnection.description: The reference to the start of the data source table that feeds content to the input stream. For the Connection Type 'udp' this object contains the pointer to the first entry of the UDP Origination table Below is an example of the value expected for a Connection Type 'udp'. An input stream (mpegInputTSIndex = 8) is being feed by a udp Connection (mpegInputUdpOriginationIndex = 4) with 3 associated udp streams each one identified by mpegInputUdpOriginationId = 1,2,3. mpegInputTSEntry TSIndex ConnectionType Connection 1 1 <any> 2 1 <any> ... 8 1 mpegInputUdpOriginationIfIndex.4.3 9 2 <any> MpegInputUdpOriginationEntry UdpOriginationIndex UdpOriginationId 3 1,4,5 4 1,2,3 ...

mpegInputTSActiveConnection.name: mpegInputTSActiveConnection
mpegInputTSActiveConnection.description: The reference to the instance of the data source that is feeding the input stream. For the Connection Type 'udp' this object contains the pointer to the UDP Origination table that the input Stream is using. Below is an example of the value expected for a Connection Type 'udp'. An input stream (mpegInputTSIndex = 8) is being feed by a udp Connection (mpegInputUdpOriginationIndex = 4) have associated 3 udp streams each one identified by mpegInputUdpOriginationId = 1,2,3. The Udp stream 3 is currently used by the input transport stream. mpegInputTSEntry TSIndex ConnectionType ActiveConnection 1 1 <any> 2 1 <any> ... 8 1 mpegInputUdpOriginationIfIndex.4.3 9 2 <any> MpegInputUdpOriginationEntry UdpOriginationIndex UdpOriginationId 3 1,4,5 4 1,2,3 ... Note in the example that the sub oid 4 (in mpegInputUdpOriginationIfIndex.4.3) represents the sub-oid that aggregates all the udp origination flows associated with the transport stream.

mpegInputTSPsiDetected.name: mpegInputTSPsiDetected
mpegInputTSPsiDetected.description: A simple check that Program Specific Information has or has not been detected. The value 'true' indicates PSI was detected.

mpegInputTSStartTime.name: mpegInputTSStartTime
mpegInputTSStartTime.description: Specifies the time the MPEG device started receiving the stream, i.e., the time the entry was added to the table.

mpegInputTSResourceAllocated.name: mpegInputTSResourceAllocated
mpegInputTSResourceAllocated.description: If true, all resources have been allocated for the stream.

mpegInputTSNumPrograms.name: mpegInputTSNumPrograms
mpegInputTSNumPrograms.description: The number of programs in the input transport stream.

mpegInputTSRate.name: mpegInputTSRate
mpegInputTSRate.description: The data rate of the incoming program or SPTS.

mpegInputTSMaxRate.name: mpegInputTSMaxRate
mpegInputTSMaxRate.description: The maximum data rate of the incoming stream for either a variable or constant bit rate stream (VBR/CVR).

mpegInputTSPatVersion.name: mpegInputTSPatVersion
mpegInputTSPatVersion.description: Program Association Table version of the transport stream. The value -1 means PAT version is not supported for input transport stream.

mpegInputTSCatVersion.name: mpegInputTSCatVersion
mpegInputTSCatVersion.description: The Conditional Access Table version number of transport stream. The value -1 means CAT version is not supported for input transport stream.

mpegInputTSNitPid.name: mpegInputTSNitPid
mpegInputTSNitPid.description: NIT PID of the input transport stream.

mpegInputTSNumEmms.name: mpegInputTSNumEmms
mpegInputTSNumEmms.description: The number of EMMs in the input stream. The default value 9999 means the device does not support encryption.

mpegInputTSTSID.name: mpegInputTSTSID
mpegInputTSTSID.description: The input TSID of the transport stream. A valid TSID is of 16 bits length. If TSID is not supported, all 32-bits shall be set to 1.

mpegInputTSLock.name: mpegInputTSLock
mpegInputTSLock.description: Indicates the lock status of the transport stream. 'intermittent' means the transport stream is transitioning between lock and unlock state over a period of time. This condition is vendor-specific. 'notMonitored' means the device is not tracking the locking state.

mpegInputProgTable.name: mpegInputProgTable
mpegInputProgTable.description: The table describing the PSI of each incoming program.

mpegInputProgEntry.name: mpegInputProgEntry
mpegInputProgEntry.description: Each entry specifies the parameters for each incoming program.

mpegInputProgIndex.name: mpegInputProgIndex
mpegInputProgIndex.description: This object serves as the third index of this mib table. The index should uniquely identify a program given a transport stream index. In other words, it's unique within same transport stream.

mpegInputProgNo.name: mpegInputProgNo
mpegInputProgNo.description: This object specifies the identifier of the program present in the transport stream of the incoming video stream. This information is contained in PAT table.

mpegInputProgPmtVersion.name: mpegInputProgPmtVersion
mpegInputProgPmtVersion.description: This object specifies the PMT version of the program. It is a 5-bit unsigned integer. The default value of 0 means input program PMT version is no supported.

mpegInputProgEcmPid.name: mpegInputProgEcmPid
mpegInputProgEcmPid.description: This object specifies the ECM PID of the program.

mpegInputProgNumElems.name: mpegInputProgNumElems
mpegInputProgNumElems.description: The number of elementary streams in the program.

mpegInputProgNumEcms.name: mpegInputProgNumEcms
mpegInputProgNumEcms.description: The number of ECMs for the program. The default value 9999 means the device does not support encryption.

mpegInputProgCaDescr.name: mpegInputProgCaDescr
mpegInputProgCaDescr.description: Conditional access descriptor is used to specify both system-wide conditional access management information such as EMMS and elementary stream-specific information such as ECMs. If any elementary stream is scrambled, a CA descriptor shall be present for the program containing that elementary stream. This object specifies the CA descriptor for this program. If the program does not have an associated CA descriptor, then this object has a zero-length string.

mpegInputProgScte35Descr.name: mpegInputProgScte35Descr
mpegInputProgScte35Descr.description: SCTE 35 descriptor. If not present, a zero-length string is returned. This field is optional for some devices that supports large number of input programs due to the fact that extensive decoding can be resource intensive and effect scalability. A zero-length string is returned.

mpegInputProgScte18Descr.name: mpegInputProgScte18Descr
mpegInputProgScte18Descr.description: SCTE 18 descriptor. If not present, a zero-length string is returned. This field is optional for some devices that supports large number of input programs due to the fact that extensive decoding can be resource intensive and effect scalability. A zero-length string is returned.

mpegProgESTable.name: mpegProgESTable
mpegProgESTable.description: This table contains information about the elementary streams in a program.

mpegProgESEntry.name: mpegProgESEntry
mpegProgESEntry.description: A combination of mpegInputTSIndex, mpegInputProgIndex and mpegProgESIndex uniquely identifies an entry in the mpegProgESTable.

mpegProgESIndex.name: mpegProgESIndex
mpegProgESIndex.description: The unique index of the elementary stream.

mpegProgESPID.name: mpegProgESPID
mpegProgESPID.description: This is the PID for each transport stream packet which carries the program element.

mpegProgESType.name: mpegProgESType
mpegProgESType.description: The type of elementary stream(video, audio, or data) of the incoming video session received from the video server.

mpegProgESCaDescr.name: mpegProgESCaDescr
mpegProgESCaDescr.description: CA descriptor associated with the elementary stream. If there is no CA descriptor for the elementary stream, then this object has a zero-length string.

mpegProgESScte35Descr.name: mpegProgESScte35Descr
mpegProgESScte35Descr.description: SCTE 35 descriptor. If not supported or present, a zero-length string is returned.

mpegProgESScte18Descr.name: mpegProgESScte18Descr
mpegProgESScte18Descr.description: SCTE 18 descriptor. If not supported or present, a zero-length string is returned.

mpegInputStatsEntry.name: mpegInputStatsEntry
mpegInputStatsEntry.description: Each entry describes statistics for each Input TS.

mpegInputStatsPcrJitter.name: mpegInputStatsPcrJitter
mpegInputStatsPcrJitter.description: This object stores the difference between the actual value of the PCR and its expected value. It is expressed in nanoseconds. This object is default to -1 if it's not supported.

mpegInputStatsMaxPacketJitter.name: mpegInputStatsMaxPacketJitter
mpegInputStatsMaxPacketJitter.description: This object stores the measurement of the maximum variation in arrival time or delay between individual packets. It is expressed in milliseconds. This object is default to -1 if it's not supported.

mpegInputStatsPcrPackets.name: mpegInputStatsPcrPackets
mpegInputStatsPcrPackets.description: This reflects the number of MPEG transport packets, having PCR, received for the stream.

mpegInputStatsNonPcrPackets.name: mpegInputStatsNonPcrPackets
mpegInputStatsNonPcrPackets.description: This reflects the number of MPEG transport packets, without PCR, received for the stream.

mpegInputStatsUnexpectedPackets.name: mpegInputStatsUnexpectedPackets
mpegInputStatsUnexpectedPackets.description: This reflects the number of transport packets whose PIDs are not expected.

mpegInputStatsContinuityErrors.name: mpegInputStatsContinuityErrors
mpegInputStatsContinuityErrors.description: Transport packets have continuity counters. Successive packets have contiguous values in the continuity counter. Continuity counter error occurs when the successive packets do not have contiguous value and discontinuity indicator is not set. This object reflects the number of continuity counter errors.

mpegInputStatsSyncLossPackets.name: mpegInputStatsSyncLossPackets
mpegInputStatsSyncLossPackets.description: When a sync byte is missing in a MPEG packet this value is incremented. This value indicates the number of MPEG packets that had missing sync byte per stream.

mpegInputStatsPcrIntervalExceeds.name: mpegInputStatsPcrIntervalExceeds
mpegInputStatsPcrIntervalExceeds.description: Indicates the number of times that the interval between two successive PCR packets for any program in the transport stream exceeds 100 milliseconds.

mpegInputUdpOriginationTable.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationTable
mpegInputUdpOriginationTable.description: Specifies the UDP unicast or multicast flows of an input transport stram. For unicast it represents the UDP port and optionally destination IP address of the input TS origination UDP IP flow. for Multicast it represents the set of SSM multicast groups of the input TS origination UDP IP flow.

mpegInputUdpOriginationEntry.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationEntry
mpegInputUdpOriginationEntry.description: Each entry specifies the IP UDP information of the input TS origination.

mpegInputUdpOriginationIndex.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationIndex
mpegInputUdpOriginationIndex.description: The unique identifier of the UDP input TS origination information.

mpegInputUdpOriginationId.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationId
mpegInputUdpOriginationId.description: The unique identifier of each UDP IP flow associated with the input TS UDP origination.

mpegInputUdpOriginationIfIndex.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationIfIndex
mpegInputUdpOriginationIfIndex.description: The interface index where the UDP flow is being received.

mpegInputUdpOriginationInetAddrType.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationInetAddrType
mpegInputUdpOriginationInetAddrType.description: The address type associated with input TS origination UDP IP flow. 'ipv4' and 'ipv6' are the only used types.

mpegInputUdpOriginationSrcInetAddr.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationSrcInetAddr
mpegInputUdpOriginationSrcInetAddr.description: For Multicast it represents the Source Specific Multicast IP Address of the UDP IP flow. For unicast UDP IP flows is either the the IP source address of the IP flow or the all zeros address if unknown or irrelevant for the input TS.

mpegInputUdpOriginationDestInetAddr.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationDestInetAddr
mpegInputUdpOriginationDestInetAddr.description: For multicast it represents the group address of the SSM origination input TS. For unicast UDP IP flows is either the IP destination address of the udp flow or the all zeros address if unknown or irrelevant for the input TS.

mpegInputUdpOriginationDestPort.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationDestPort
mpegInputUdpOriginationDestPort.description: The UDP destination port of the UDP IP flow of the input TS.

mpegInputUdpOriginationActive.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationActive
mpegInputUdpOriginationActive.description: The activation state of the UDP flow. The value 'true' indicates the UDP flow data stream is being sensed or buffered for the input TS, independently of that flow being used for a video session. Otherwise the value 'false' is reported. For multicast UDP origination flows the value 'true' indicates the UDP flow was successfully joined.

mpegInputUdpOriginationPacketsDetected.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationPacketsDetected
mpegInputUdpOriginationPacketsDetected.description: Indicates whether UDP flow packets are being detected. It is vendor dependent the determination if packets for a UDP flow are being detected.

mpegInputUdpOriginationRank.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationRank
mpegInputUdpOriginationRank.description: Indicates the Rank Priority used to determine the UDP flow selected for the input TS processing and Video Session assignments.

mpegInputUdpOriginationInputTSIndex.name: mpegInputUdpOriginationInputTSIndex
mpegInputUdpOriginationInputTSIndex.description: The mpegInputTSIndex that this entry is associated with

mpegInsertPacketTable.name: mpegInsertPacketTable
mpegInsertPacketTable.description: This table describes packet insertion information. Typical packets that are inserted at the RF output of a device are PSI, PSIP, and CVCT MPEG packets. These packets have their own PID. This table may be empty if the video device does not support packet insertion or do not have any packet insertion configured.

mpegInsertPacketEntry.name: mpegInsertPacketEntry
mpegInsertPacketEntry.description: An entry in the Packet Management Table.

mpegInsertPacketIndex.name: mpegInsertPacketIndex
mpegInsertPacketIndex.description: Index of list of packets being inserted into all MPEG streams. This index is unique within the SNMP agent that may be managing multiple MPEG devices.

mpegInsertPacketListId.name: mpegInsertPacketListId
mpegInsertPacketListId.description: Reference number of packets being inserted into MPEG stream.

mpegInsertPacketImmediateExecution.name: mpegInsertPacketImmediateExecution
mpegInsertPacketImmediateExecution.description: If true, packet insertion starts immediately.

mpegInsertPacketStartTime.name: mpegInsertPacketStartTime
mpegInsertPacketStartTime.description: Unix epoch start time for insertions (if Immediate Execution is false).

mpegInsertPacketRepeat.name: mpegInsertPacketRepeat
mpegInsertPacketRepeat.description: Indicates whether the insert packet is one-time or repetitive.

mpegInsertPacketContinuousFlag.name: mpegInsertPacketContinuousFlag
mpegInsertPacketContinuousFlag.description: If true, packet will be sent periodically, until cancelled.

mpegInsertPacketRate.name: mpegInsertPacketRate
mpegInsertPacketRate.description: Rate at which packet list should be inserted.

mpegInsertPacketDeviceIfIndex.name: mpegInsertPacketDeviceIfIndex
mpegInsertPacketDeviceIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of the output device interface that the packet will be inserted at.

mpegOutputStatsTable.name: mpegOutputStatsTable
mpegOutputStatsTable.description: The table specifies the diagnostic stats objects for the outputs transport stream of an MPEG device.

mpegOutputStatsEntry.name: mpegOutputStatsEntry
mpegOutputStatsEntry.description: Each entry specifies the diagnostics for each output TS.

mpegOutputStatsDroppedPackets.name: mpegOutputStatsDroppedPackets
mpegOutputStatsDroppedPackets.description: Number of MPEG packets dropped on this output transport stream.

mpegOutputStatsFifoOverflow.name: mpegOutputStatsFifoOverflow
mpegOutputStatsFifoOverflow.description: Number of FIFO overflows on this output transport stream.

mpegOutputStatsFifoUnderflow.name: mpegOutputStatsFifoUnderflow
mpegOutputStatsFifoUnderflow.description: Number of FIFO underflows on this output transport stream.

mpegOutputStatsDataRate.name: mpegOutputStatsDataRate
mpegOutputStatsDataRate.description: Data rate for the content on this output transport stream.

mpegOutputStatsChannelUtilization.name: mpegOutputStatsChannelUtilization
mpegOutputStatsChannelUtilization.description: The current utilization of a channel defined as (measured data rate / total bandwidth ) * 1000. If not applicable, a value of -1 is returned.

mpegOutputStatsTotalPackets.name: mpegOutputStatsTotalPackets
mpegOutputStatsTotalPackets.description: The total number of packets output for this transport stream since the start of the output stream.

mpegOutputTSTable.name: mpegOutputTSTable
mpegOutputTSTable.description: This table specifies the attributes of an outgoing transport stream SPTS or MPTS.

mpegOutputTSEntry.name: mpegOutputTSEntry
mpegOutputTSEntry.description: Each entry specifies the attributes of an output transport stream, SPTS or MPTS.

mpegOutputTSIndex.name: mpegOutputTSIndex
mpegOutputTSIndex.description: Table index. It uniquely identifies a mpegOutputTSEntry. This index is independent from mpegOutputTSTSID.

mpegOutputTSType.name: mpegOutputTSType
mpegOutputTSType.description: The type of stream, e.g., SPTS or MPTS.

mpegOutputTSConnectionType.name: mpegOutputTSConnectionType
mpegOutputTSConnectionType.description: The type of output flow of the stream. The value 'qam' indicates a QAM output for the stream The value 'udp' indicates either unicast or multicast udp destination flows for the stream.

mpegOutputTSConnection.name: mpegOutputTSConnection
mpegOutputTSConnection.description: The reference to the instance of the output connection fpr the output stream. For the Connection Type 'qam' this object contains the ifIndex object identifier of the QAM channel for the output stream. For the Connection Type 'udp' this object contains the pointer to the UDP Destination table being used for the output stream. This is similar to mpegInputTSConnection - See description for details.

mpegOutputTSNumPrograms.name: mpegOutputTSNumPrograms
mpegOutputTSNumPrograms.description: The number of programs in the output transport stream.

mpegOutputTSTSID.name: mpegOutputTSTSID
mpegOutputTSTSID.description: The TSID of the output transport stream.

mpegOutputTSNitPid.name: mpegOutputTSNitPid
mpegOutputTSNitPid.description: NIT PID of the outgoing transport stream.

mpegOutputTSCaPid.name: mpegOutputTSCaPid
mpegOutputTSCaPid.description: The CA PID of the outgoing transport stream.

mpegOutputTSPatInsertRate.name: mpegOutputTSPatInsertRate
mpegOutputTSPatInsertRate.description: The PAT table interval expressed in ms.

mpegOutputTSPmtInsertRate.name: mpegOutputTSPmtInsertRate
mpegOutputTSPmtInsertRate.description: The PMT insertion rate. This is expressed in tables/second.

mpegOutputTSStartTime.name: mpegOutputTSStartTime
mpegOutputTSStartTime.description: This object specifies the time the MPEG device started transmitting the output stream, i.e., the time the entry was added to the table. The support of this object is optional. If not supported, this object is default to a zero length string.

mpegOutputProgTable.name: mpegOutputProgTable
mpegOutputProgTable.description: The table describing the PSI of each outgoing program.

mpegOutputProgEntry.name: mpegOutputProgEntry
mpegOutputProgEntry.description: Each entry specifies the parameters for each incoming program.

mpegOutputProgIndex.name: mpegOutputProgIndex
mpegOutputProgIndex.description: This object is the table index for output program.

mpegOutputProgNo.name: mpegOutputProgNo
mpegOutputProgNo.description: This object specifies the identifier of the program present in the transport stream of the outgoing program.

mpegOutputProgPmtVersion.name: mpegOutputProgPmtVersion
mpegOutputProgPmtVersion.description: This object specifies the PMT version of the outgoing program. The default value of 0 means output program PMT version is not supported.

mpegOutputProgPmtPid.name: mpegOutputProgPmtPid
mpegOutputProgPmtPid.description: PMT PID of the outgoing program.

mpegOutputProgPcrPid.name: mpegOutputProgPcrPid
mpegOutputProgPcrPid.description: PCR PID of the outgoing program.

mpegOutputProgEcmPid.name: mpegOutputProgEcmPid
mpegOutputProgEcmPid.description: This object specifies the ECM PID of the outgoing program.

mpegOutputProgNumElems.name: mpegOutputProgNumElems
mpegOutputProgNumElems.description: The number of elementary streams in the outgoing program.

mpegOutputProgNumEcms.name: mpegOutputProgNumEcms
mpegOutputProgNumEcms.description: The number of ECMs for the outgoing program. The default value 9999 means the device does not support encryption.

mpegOutputProgCaDescr.name: mpegOutputProgCaDescr
mpegOutputProgCaDescr.description: Conditional access descriptor is used to specify both system-wide conditional access management information such as EMMS and elementary stream-specific information such as ECMs. If any elementary stream is scrambled, a CA descriptor shall be present for the program containing that elementary stream. This object specifies the CA descriptor for this program. If the outgoing program does not have an associated CA descriptor, then this object has a zero-length string.

mpegOutputProgScte35Descr.name: mpegOutputProgScte35Descr
mpegOutputProgScte35Descr.description: SCTE 35 descriptor in the outgoing program. This object is set to a string of zero-length if there's no SCTE 35 descriptor in the outgoing program or not supported.

mpegOutputProgScte18Descr.name: mpegOutputProgScte18Descr
mpegOutputProgScte18Descr.description: SCTE 18 descriptor. If not present or not supported, a zero-length string is returned.

mpegOutputProgElemStatsTable.name: mpegOutputProgElemStatsTable
mpegOutputProgElemStatsTable.description: The stats associated with the elementary streams of an MPEG program.

mpegOutputProgElemStatsEntry.name: mpegOutputProgElemStatsEntry
mpegOutputProgElemStatsEntry.description: Each entry constitutes the stats for a program associated with a transport stream.

mpegOutputProgElemStatsIndex.name: mpegOutputProgElemStatsIndex
mpegOutputProgElemStatsIndex.description: The unique identifier of the elementary stream.

mpegOutputProgElemStatsPid.name: mpegOutputProgElemStatsPid
mpegOutputProgElemStatsPid.description: The Pid of output program elementary stream.

mpegOutputProgElemStatsElemType.name: mpegOutputProgElemStatsElemType
mpegOutputProgElemStatsElemType.description: The type of elementary stream (video, audio, or data) of the program. Some devices, such as device, may choose not to report exact type due to scalability issues, in which case, this object shall be set to unknown.

mpegOutputProgElemStatsDataRate.name: mpegOutputProgElemStatsDataRate
mpegOutputProgElemStatsDataRate.description: The data rate of the elementary stream. Return -1 if not supported.

mpegOutputUdpDestinationTable.name: mpegOutputUdpDestinationTable
mpegOutputUdpDestinationTable.description: Specifies the UDP unicast or multicast of the output TS this entry references. For unicast it represents the UDP port and optionally destination IP address of the output TS destination UDP IP flow. for Multicast it represents the set of SSM multicast groups of the output TS destination UDP IP flow.

mpegOutputUdpDestinationEntry.name: mpegOutputUdpDestinationEntry
mpegOutputUdpDestinationEntry.description: Each entry specifies the IP UDP information of the output TS destination.

mpegOutputUdpDestinationIndex.name: mpegOutputUdpDestinationIndex
mpegOutputUdpDestinationIndex.description: The unique identifier of the UDP output TS destination information.

mpegOutputUdpDestinationId.name: mpegOutputUdpDestinationId
mpegOutputUdpDestinationId.description: The unique identifier of each UDP IP flow associated with the output TS UDP destination.

mpegOutputUdpDestinationIfIndex.name: mpegOutputUdpDestinationIfIndex
mpegOutputUdpDestinationIfIndex.description: The interface index where the UDP flow is being sent.

mpegOutputUdpDestinationInetAddrType.name: mpegOutputUdpDestinationInetAddrType
mpegOutputUdpDestinationInetAddrType.description: The address type associated with output TS destination UDP IP flow.

mpegOutputUdpDestinationSrcInetAddr.name: mpegOutputUdpDestinationSrcInetAddr
mpegOutputUdpDestinationSrcInetAddr.description: For Multicast it represents the Source Specific Multicast IP Address of the UDP IP flow. For unicast UDP IP flows is either the the IP source address of the IP flow or the all zeros address if unknown or irrelevant for the destination output TS.

mpegOutputUdpDestinationDestInetAddr.name: mpegOutputUdpDestinationDestInetAddr
mpegOutputUdpDestinationDestInetAddr.description: For multicast it represents the group address of the SSM destination output TS. For unicast UDP IP flows is either the IP destination address of the udp flow or the all zeros address if unknown or irrelevant for the destination output TS.

mpegOutputUdpDestinationDestPort.name: mpegOutputUdpDestinationDestPort
mpegOutputUdpDestinationDestPort.description: The UDP port of the UDP IP flow of the output TS.

mpegOutputUdpDestinationOutputTSIndex.name: mpegOutputUdpDestinationOutputTSIndex
mpegOutputUdpDestinationOutputTSIndex.description: The mpegOutputTSIndex that this entry is associated with.

mpegProgramMappingTable.name: mpegProgramMappingTable
mpegProgramMappingTable.description: This table describes program mappings, i.e., ties the input destination to the output destination for every program active in the device.

mpegProgramMappingEntry.name: mpegProgramMappingEntry
mpegProgramMappingEntry.description: Each entry describes the mapping, i.e., ties input destination to output destination for a given program.

mpegProgramMappingIndex.name: mpegProgramMappingIndex
mpegProgramMappingIndex.description: The table index uniquely identifies an entry in mpegProgramMappingTable. This index should be unique within the same SNMP agent that may be managing multiple MPEG devices.

mpegProgramMappingOutputProgIndex.name: mpegProgramMappingOutputProgIndex
mpegProgramMappingOutputProgIndex.description: This object is set to mpegOutputProgIndex of the corresponding entry in mpegOutputProgTable for a given output program.

mpegProgramMappingOutputTSIndex.name: mpegProgramMappingOutputTSIndex
mpegProgramMappingOutputTSIndex.description: This object is set to mpegOutputTSIndex of the corresponding entry in mpegOutputProgTable for a given output program.

mpegProgramMappingInputProgIndex.name: mpegProgramMappingInputProgIndex
mpegProgramMappingInputProgIndex.description: This object is set to the value of mpegInputProgIndex of the corresponding entry in mpegInputProgTable for a given input program.

mpegProgramMappingInputTSIndex.name: mpegProgramMappingInputTSIndex
mpegProgramMappingInputTSIndex.description: This object is set to the value of mpegInputTSIndex of the corresponding entry in mpegInputProgTable for a given input program.

mpegVideoSessionTable.name: mpegVideoSessionTable
mpegVideoSessionTable.description: This table is used to store video session information. The session may be of VOD, SDV or DB type. It captures logical information about a video stream, such as source and destination addresses, UDP port etc, and also ties it with its direct mapping of input and output programs. This table captures video sessions provisioned by both session-based and table-based method. It is capable to support N-M mapping of video programs that's required for redundant source or video stream cloning etc.

mpegVideoSessionEntry.name: mpegVideoSessionEntry
mpegVideoSessionEntry.description: Each entry describes a logical video session.

mpegVideoSessionIndex.name: mpegVideoSessionIndex
mpegVideoSessionIndex.description: The table index uniquely identifies an entry in mpegVideoSessionTable. This index should be unique within the same SNMP agent that may be managing multiple MPEG devices.

mpegVideoSessionPhyMappingIndex.name: mpegVideoSessionPhyMappingIndex
mpegVideoSessionPhyMappingIndex.description: This object shall be set to mpegProgramMappingIndex of the corresponding mpegProgramMappingEntry which contains physical mapping between the input and output program.

mpegVideoSessionPIDRemap.name: mpegVideoSessionPIDRemap
mpegVideoSessionPIDRemap.description: This object value 'true' indicates that the session has PID remapping. The value 'false' indicates that the session has no PID remapping.

mpegVideoSessionMode.name: mpegVideoSessionMode
mpegVideoSessionMode.description: Indicates whether the transport stream is associated with a multiplexed session or is pass-through. For pass-through type transport streams, all elementary stream level information in optional.

mpegVideoSessionState.name: mpegVideoSessionState
mpegVideoSessionState.description: active means in-use, provisioned means not-in-use or active such as video session provisioned for redundant source.

mpegVideoSessionProvMethod.name: mpegVideoSessionProvMethod
mpegVideoSessionProvMethod.description: The type of session, e.g., in QAM table-based or session-based.

mpegVideoSessionEncryptionType.name: mpegVideoSessionEncryptionType
mpegVideoSessionEncryptionType.description: Indicates the encryption algorithm of the session.

mpegVideoSessionEncryptionInfo.name: mpegVideoSessionEncryptionInfo
mpegVideoSessionEncryptionInfo.description: Indicates a vendor-specific reference to information associated to the session encryption algorithm.

mpegVideoSessionBitRate.name: mpegVideoSessionBitRate
mpegVideoSessionBitRate.description: Indicates a session throughtput in bps.

mpegVideoSessionID.name: mpegVideoSessionID
mpegVideoSessionID.description: The session ID associated with the stream in the case of a session-based QAM. This is not applicable to a table-based QAM. This ID may be used by NMS system to uniquely identify an input program to output program mapping.

mpegVideoSessionSelectedInput.name: mpegVideoSessionSelectedInput
mpegVideoSessionSelectedInput.description: The reference to the entry of the input flow currently being used in the video session.

mpegVideoSessionSelectedOutput.name: mpegVideoSessionSelectedOutput
mpegVideoSessionSelectedOutput.description: The reference to the entry of the output flow currently being used in the video session.

mpegVideoSessionPtrTable.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrTable
mpegVideoSessionPtrTable.description: This table is used to provide a quick reference of the Program Mapping and input/output TS connection information associated with a Video Session.

mpegVideoSessionPtrEntry.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrEntry
mpegVideoSessionPtrEntry.description: Each entry describes the associations with ProgramMapping and transport stream connections.

mpegVideoSessionPtrInputProgIndex.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrInputProgIndex
mpegVideoSessionPtrInputProgIndex.description: Indicates the Input Program index value of the video session.

mpegVideoSessionPtrInputTSIndex.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrInputTSIndex
mpegVideoSessionPtrInputTSIndex.description: Indicates the input TS index value of the video session.

mpegVideoSessionPtrInputTSConnType.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrInputTSConnType
mpegVideoSessionPtrInputTSConnType.description: Indicates the Input TS Connection type value of the video session.

mpegVideoSessionPtrInputTSConnection.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrInputTSConnection
mpegVideoSessionPtrInputTSConnection.description: Indicates the Input TS Connection value of the video session.

mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputProgIndex.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputProgIndex
mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputProgIndex.description: Indicates the Output Program index value of the video session.

mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputTSIndex.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputTSIndex
mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputTSIndex.description: Indicates the Output TS index value of the video session.

mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputTSConnType.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputTSConnType
mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputTSConnType.description: Indicates the Output TS Connection type value of the video session.

mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputTSConnection.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputTSConnection
mpegVideoSessionPtrOutputTSConnection.description: Indicates the Output TS Connection value of the video session.

mpegVideoSessionPtrStatus.name: mpegVideoSessionPtrStatus
mpegVideoSessionPtrStatus.description: Indicates the status of the session. Only active sessions need to be reported.

mpegInputTSOutputSessionTable.name: mpegInputTSOutputSessionTable
mpegInputTSOutputSessionTable.description: Specifies the list of Output Session indexes that the Input TS entry is feeding. For unicast it will typically point to just one output Session. For multicast, it will point to all the output Sessions using this internally replicated input TS.

mpegInputTSOutputSessionEntry.name: mpegInputTSOutputSessionEntry
mpegInputTSOutputSessionEntry.description: Each entry specifies the sessionID associated with the Input TS Entry Index.

mpegInputTSOutputSessionCreateTime.name: mpegInputTSOutputSessionCreateTime
mpegInputTSOutputSessionCreateTime.description: Indicates the Creation Time of the session referenced by this entry.

mpegSupport.name: mpegSupport
mpegSupport.description: These objects describe the support level for MPEG.

mpegInputGroup.name: mpegInputGroup
mpegInputGroup.description: The input objects of the MPEG device.

mpegInputProgESGroup.name: mpegInputProgESGroup
mpegInputProgESGroup.description: This table contains information about the elementary streams in a program.

mpegOutputGroup.name: mpegOutputGroup
mpegOutputGroup.description: The output objects of the MPEG device.

mpegOutputProgElemStatsGroup.name: mpegOutputProgElemStatsGroup
mpegOutputProgElemStatsGroup.description: The stats associated with the elementary streams of an MPEG program.

mpegMappingsGroup.name: mpegMappingsGroup
mpegMappingsGroup.description: The group of objects describing program mappings within the Device.

mpegSessionsGroup.name: mpegSessionsGroup
mpegSessionsGroup.description: The group of objects describing program mappings within the Device.

comments: Produced by pysmi-0.3.4 at Tue Apr 20 18:13:33 2021
